BEFORE:
nn.Linear(m_dim * heads, m_dim * 4),
            nn.ReLU(),
            nn.Linear(m_dim * 4, 1),
            Rearrange('... () -> ...'),
            nn.TanH() if norm_coor_weights else nn.Identity()
AFTER:
nn.Linear(m_dim, m_dim * 4),
            nn.ReLU(),
            nn.Linear(m_dim * 4, 1),
            Rearrange('... () -> ...')
        )

        self.rel_coors_norm = CoorsNorm() if norm_rel_coors else nn.Identity()

        self.to_coors_out = nn.Sequential(
            nn.Linear(heads, 1),
            Rearrange('... () -> ...')
        )
